name: Color Plane
description:
Color Plane is a colorful shoot 'em up.

Shoot colored projectiles at meteors to destroy them. The color of the projectile must match the color of the meteor. But beware, the game will get faster and faster the longer you play! For every meteor you destroy, your multiplier increases. However, if you make a mistake, your multiplier resets back to 1!

Go for that high score!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move your ship
Z to shoot a red bullet
X to shoot a yellow bullet
C to shoot a blue bullet
Mouse to navigate the menu

Play the game in your browser now!
